text: ṛju mārgaya meya yayi tamanṭa pæhædili vūvāyin pasuvada kavurun (allāhgē) mema dūtayāva athæra damā ven vī viśvāsavantayingen novana mārgayehi gaman karannēda, ohuva api ohu gaman karana (væradi) mārgayehima yannaṭa iḍa dī, (pasuva) ohuva nirayehi sēndu kara harinnemu. eya yana sthānayangen itāmat narakaya
